root.name: Clash of the Titans
root.description: Overview Clash of the Titans: The Videogame is a hack-and-slash action title developed by Game Republic and published by Namco Bandai Games. It was released on July 27, 2010 in North America, three months after the film it is based on was released in theaters. In the game, the player takes the role of Perseus, the half-god son of Zeus, who journeys to stop a feud between Zeus and Hades from resulting in the destruction of a human city.
